title: Loop Plan Schema
description: Schema for validating Orchestrator loop plans

agents.description: Ordered list of agents that will execute the loop

goals.description: List of goals for the loop

planned_files.description: List of files that will be created or modified during the loop

confirmed.description: Whether the loop plan has been confirmed

confirmed_at.description: When the loop plan was confirmed

tool_requirements.description: Optional list of tools required for the loop

plan_score.description: Optional score for the plan quality
